Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Response to playback from a pair about 5-6m in Cecropia second growth along airstrip. Whistling vocalizations usually given when changing perches, and raised nape feathers simultraneously. At very end, flying. Photo: link:http://www.flickr.com/photos/8013969@N03/5545338164/
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Thraupis palmarum,Amazona amazonica,Ramphastos tucanus,Xiphorhynchus guttatus,Xiphorhynchus guttatus
